descr.p: "Mr. Custer" is a novelty song, sung by Larry Verne, and written by Al DeLory, Fred Darian and Joseph Van Winkle that was a number-one song in the United States during the year 1960. It topped the Hot 100 singles chart for the issue dated October 10, 1960, and remained there for one week. It is a comical song about a soldier's plea to Custer at the climatic Battle of the Little Bighorn against the Sioux that he did not want to fight.
